participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, empathetic, and a bit self-critical.
participant_1.background: I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business. I like to place blame on other people even when I know it is my fault. I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions. I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active. I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food. Until recently I've never been able to sing in front of anyone. My parents were not a good fit for me, so I moved out when I was 14. I am proud of my healthy lifestyle and I want to be a good role model for my girlfriend and the baby. I have never been to Canada.

content.text: Hey! I like the color green too. I have a cupcake business and green is the main color of my cupcake wrappers.
Really? I like locally sourced, organic food. Do you make your cupcakes with that?
I do! I think it's important to eat healthy, and I want my cupcakes to be as healthy as possible.
That's great! I'm really into my health and fitness too. I've been working out a lot lately and I've been eating really healthy.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're taking care of yourself. I try to work out too, but it's hard to find the time sometimes.
I know what you mean. It's hard to make time for everything, but it's important to make time for your health.
Yeah, you're right. I'm going to try to work out more often.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be able to find the time.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to write poetry and play guitar. I also like to do arts and crafts.
That's cool! I've never been able to write poetry or play guitar. I used to do arts and crafts a lot when I was younger, but I haven't really done it in a while.
You should try it again! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. I've been thinking about it lately.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
